name: armorLight
label: Light Armor [+1]
description: Ballistic bulletproof vest

name: armorHeavy
label: Heavy Armor [+2]
description: Police or military heavy duty full-body armor

name: unarmed
label: Unarmed
description: Unarmed strike or kick with bare hands

attacks: Lock [0] [you are in control of the target until they break free]
Shift [0] [you create distance between yourself and the target through a throw, body check, or push]
Disarm [0] [you remove an object your opponent held in their hand]
Excessive force [2] [focus entirely on killing your target, disregarding your own safety]

name: edgedWeapons
label: Edged Weapons
description: knife, stiletto, dagger.

attacks: Edge at the throat [0] [you are in control of the target until they break free]

name: crushingWeapons
label: Crushing Weapons
description: baseball bat, hammer, crowbar.

attacks: Knock down [1] [the target falls to the ground]
Knock out [1] [target is knocked out; PCs must successfully Endure Injury to avoid getting knocked out]

name: choppingWeapons
label: Chopping Weapons
description: machete, axe, sword.

name: handgun
label: Handgun
description: Beretta M92FS, Colt M1911A1, CZ P-10 C, FN Five seveN, Glock 19, Glock 23, H&K USP45, H&K VP9, S&W Model 10, S&W MP40 Shield, SIG-Sauer P226, Walther P99.

attacks: Multiple targets [2] [hit up to one additional target] [-3 Ammo]

name: magnumHandgun
label: Magnum Handgun
description: Colt Python, FA Model 83, IMI Desert Eagle, Ruger GP100, Ruger New Model Super Blackhawk, Ruger Super Redhawk, S&W M586, S&W Model S&W500, Taurus Raging Bull.

name: smg
label: Submachine Gun (SMG)
description: FN P90, Glock 18, H&K MP5, H&K MP7, H&K UMP45, IMI Uzi, Ingram MAC-10, KRISS Vector, Skorpion vz.61, Steyr AUG A3 Para XS.

attacks: Spray and pray [2] [hit up to two additional targets] [-3 Ammo]

name: assaultRifle
label: Assault Rifle
description: AK-47/AKM/AK-103, Colt M4A1, FAMAS, FN SCAR-L, H&K G36, HK416, IWI Tavor TAR-21, QBZ-95-1, SA80, Steyr AUG.

attacks: Empty the mag [3] [hit up to two additional targets] [-4 Ammo]

name: machineGun
label: Machine Gun
description: FN MAG, M249, M60, MG5, RPK-74.

attacks: Sustained fire [3] [hit up to three additional targets] [-3 Ammo]

name: rifle
label: Rifle
description: Various hunting rifles, marksman rifles (like FN SCAR-H, Mk 14 EBR, SVD, etc.), and sniper rifles (like AI Arctic Warfare, H&K PSG-1, McMillan TAC-338, etc.)

name: combatShotgun
label: Combat Shotgun
description: Benelli M3 Super 90, Franchi SPAS-12, Mossberg 500, Remington M870, Saiga-12, Winchester M1300.

attacks: Pellet storm [3/1]* [small close group all hit at once] [-2 Ammo]
Base Harm is 3 against target(s) at Room distance, and 1 if beyond.

name: explosives
label: Explosives
description: Hand grenade, demolition charge, bomb.

name: dog
label: Dog
description: A dog can take 1-3 Wounds (depending on the size of the dog). An attacking dog can attack.

actions: Knock over [1] [Distance: arm, no small dogs].
Bite [1-2] [Distance: arm, the dog can lock jaws and not let go].

name: teargasSpray
label: Teargas spray
description: Tear gas, also known as a lachrymator agent or lachrymator. While lachrymatory agents are commonly deployed for riot control by law enforcement and military personnel, its use in warfare is prohibited by various international treaties.

actions: Spray [0] [Distance: arm, NPC target is neutralized, PC target Endures Injury and is knocked out on a (-9)].

name: lockpicks
label: Lockpicks
description: The PC can open a locked door. Depending on circumstances, the PC may be Act Under Pressure.

name: crowbar
label: Crowbar
description: The PC can open a locked door but will be making a lot of noise in the process. Depending on circumstances, the PC may be Acting Under Pressure. Crowbars can be used as crushing hand-to-hand weapons.

name: firstAidKit
label: First aid kit
description: The PC can stabilize Wounds. If the Wound is Critical (or if circumstances otherwise suggest it), the PC rolls Act Under Pressure.

name: stunGunTaser
label: Stun gun (taser)
description: Stun guns of the self-defense kind might require the attacker to physically touch her victim, while those used by law enforcement can eject electrodes up to a few meters distance. The latter kind requires recharging before repeat use.

actions: Shock [1] [Distance: arm/room, NPC target is neutralized, PC target Endures Injury and is knocked out on a (-9)].

name: silencer
label: Silencer
description: A silencer is a gun attachment, which muffles the noise of firing the weapon. The noise doesn't disappear entirely and the effect is highly dependent on the weapon's type and caliber. As a general rule of thumb, the noise is only detectable in the immediate surroundings (room).
icon: <svg fill="currentColor" width="100%" height="100%" version="1.1" id="Capa_1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"  viewBox="0 0 20.969 20.969" xml:space="preserve"><g><g id="c112_-"><rect x="0" y="6.504" width="20.969" height="7.961"/></g><g id="Capa_1_45_"></g></g></svg>

name: flashbang
label: Flashbang
description: A flashbang is an explosive used to daze people in the vicinity by emitting a blinding flash of light accompanied by a loud bang. It causes no bodily harm.

actions: Detonation [-] [Distance: room/field, hits multiple targets, NPCs are momentarily neutralized, PCs may Avoid Harm and are momentarily       neutralized on a (-9)].

name: knockoutGasDrugs
label: Knockout Gas / Drugs
description: Examples: desflurane, isoflurane, sevoflurane. Knockout gasses or drugs can be used to force characters into unconsciousness by making them breathe in the fumes or ingest the drug. A PC might for example fill the target's inhaler with the gas or soak a rag and cover the target's mouth and nose with it.

actions: Knockout [-] [Distance: arm/room, NPC target is momentarily neutralized, PC target Endures Injury and is knocked out on a (-9)].

name: torch
label: Torch
description: In addition to illuminating the surroundings, a torch can be used as a weapon.

name: custom
label: Custom
description: Custom gear or posessions
